thread.title: WATCH LIVE: Protest Breaks Out in Berkeley Over Milo Yiannopoulos Speech
thread.title_full: WATCH LIVE: Protest Breaks Out in Berkeley Over Milo Yiannopoulos Speech

author: Mediaite
title: WATCH LIVE: Protest Breaks Out in Berkeley Over Milo Yiannopoulos Speech
text:
WATCH LIVE: Protest Breaks Out in Berkeley Over Milo Yiannopoulos Speech by Mediaite | 9:47   Video 
Breitbart editor and conservative provocateur Milo Yiannopoulos was scheduled to speak on the campus of UC Berkeley this evening. However, that speech was canceled as a large demonstration broke out that turned violent. Fires have broken out, property has been damaged, and the police were forced to disperse the crowd. 
Watch the livestream of the protest below that is still ongoing: 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
